TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1267-1268
TEI.2.document_title: Leonidas W. Baker to James E. B. Austin, 02-26-1826

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1267-1268

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Inquiry concerning Texas.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*location_mentioned*Steam Boat Hamilton. Ohio River.*/location_mentioned*
*p**date_mentioned n="02-26-1826">Feby. 26th 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear sir,*/p*
*p*An opportunity just presents itself of conveying a few lines to you; and if the impressions of early youth are as pleasing to you as they are to me, this little memento may give birth to a few moments of cheerful reflection.*/p*
*p*I left *location_mentioned*Forest Hill*/location_mentioned* (the theatre of our first acquaintance) in the year *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1819">1819*/date_mentioned*, and *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1820">twelve months after */date_mentioned*commenced the study of law, completed it, and have since qualified myself for the practice of *person_mentioned*medicine*/person_mentioned*, and am, at present, engaged in that capacity.*/p*
*p*Now if you believe, that the health, locality, and prospects of any part of the province of *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*, will suit me, or any of my *person_mentioned*friends*/person_mentioned*, who might be disposed to embark on Fortune's schooner, you will be good enough to write, and give me a geographical history of the *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*.*/p* *p*Direct your letter to *location_mentioned*Hardenburgh, Breckenridge Cty, Ky*/location_mentioned*.*/p* *p*Respectfully, your fellow student,*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Leonidas W. Baker*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Mr. James Austin*/person_mentioned*, *location_mentioned*Austin's Settlement Texas*/location_mentioned**/p* */div1*
